revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix (2), SK SK hynix → SK hynix (2)
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = A13-OLinuXino-MAXI-WIFI-1.jpg |image1_size = 300px |caption = Single Board Computer |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.olimex.com/Products/OLinuXino/A13/A13-OLinuXino-WIFI/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Olimex |model = A13 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = -OLinuXino |revision = (WIFI) rev C |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 2016/12/29 |page_start_origon = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/olimex/olimex_a13-olinuxino-wifi |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = RK9-RTL8188CTV |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Allwinner;A13; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A8 |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- 1.0GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = SK hynix;H27UBG8T2BTR; |flash1size = 4 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5TQ2G83CFR; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_none = true |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2011.09-rc1-00000-g6c60200-dirty;; |stockos = Linux;3.0.8+;Android 4.0.3;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, microSD Card slot |exp_usb_num = 4 |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 0.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes |jtag = yes
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = UEXT, GPIO, VGA, Audio in (3.5mm), Audio out (3.5 mm) |addchip = 4-port USB Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL850G;;1;,,, Li-Battery and Power Management IC;X-Powers Ltd;AXP209;;1;,,, I2C RTC;NXP Semiconductor;PCF8563;;1;,,, 2A, 18V Synchronous Rectified Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP1482;;1;,,, Octal Buffer Driver;Texas Instruments;SN74ALVC244;;3; |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Armbian (unofficial), OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 09/05/2012 |estreldate = 08/31/2012 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Bulgaria
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = LB-LINK BL-8188-8M |rad1modif = USB (non-standard connector) |rad1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8188CUS; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *[https://github.com/OLIMEX/OLINUXINO Open Source/Open Hardware] *[http://linux-sunxi.org/Olimex_A13-OLinuXino ''Olimex_A13-OLinuXino'' on '''linux-sunxi.org'''] ([http://linux-sunxi.org/images/4/4f/A13-olinuxino-rev-a-front.jpg PCB image]) :[https://www.olimex.com/Products/Components/RF/MOD-RTL8188CU/ MOD-RTL8188CU] - Wi-Fi Module ([http://www.wlancards.com/3-2-4-wifi-wireless-module.html LB-LINK BL-8188-8M] module) {{see also|LB-LINK BL-R8188EU1}}
